import { Modal, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" function AddTodoForm( ) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false) const [submit, handleSubmit] = useForm const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data) const sendFormat = { url: 'http://localhost:8000/api/todo-all/', method: 'POST', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF=8' }, data: { } } axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/todo-all/', { data }) .then() } return (
setShow(false)} size='lg' >

) } export default AddTodoForm
